art_direction: A carnival of forgotten horrors, where joy is twisted into dread, rendered in a vintage pixelated aesthetic.

scenes.title: The Gate of Glee's Demise
scenes.text: The iron gates groan, a rusted welcome to a realm forgotten. A cold wind whips past, carrying whispers like dry leaves. They brush against your ears, indistinct names. Before you, a carnival, frozen in time, yet unnervingly alive. Twisted banners ripple. A colossal, grotesque face adorns the main archway, its painted smile cracked, its eyes vacant. Beyond, a carousel shimmers with spectral light. To the right, a large, decaying tent beckons, its canvas faded to muted greens and reds.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A rusted, ornate iron gate stands open at center. A grotesque, cracked painted face on a marquee archway above the gate. A carousel with distorted horses on the left, emitting a faint glow. A large, tattered tent on the right, barely visible in the gloom.

choices.text: Seek shelter in the shadowed Tent.

scenes.title: The Steeds of Silent Dread
scenes.text: The carousel stands still, its once-proud steeds now figures of despair. Peeling paint reveals dark wood beneath. A horse with a dislocated leg leans precariously. The cold air here feels heavier, laden with the scent of dust and decay. Whispers seem to emanate from beneath the rotating platform, tiny, almost childish voices. Upon a saddle, a small, porcelain doll sits, its eyes missing, yet it feels as if it watches.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A broken carousel at center, its painted horses distorted and peeling. A small, porcelain doll with empty eye sockets sits on one of the wooden horses, slightly to the right of center. Rusted metal machinery is visible beneath the carousel platform.

choices.text: Examine the doll on the carousel horse.
Try to find the source of the whispering voices under the carousel.

scenes.title: Within the Canvas Maw
scenes.text: You push aside a heavy, tattered flap, entering the tent's stifling interior. The air is thick with dust. Faded banners depicting smiling clowns and acrobats hang low, their colors muted reds and greens. Shelves line the walls, displaying an array of forgotten wind-up toys: tin soldiers, miniature clowns, and jesters. One clockwork jester, at eye level on a central shelf, seems poised, its head slightly tilted, its painted grin too wide. Voices hum, a low, unsettling vibration, coming from the toys.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. Inside a decaying carnival tent. Faded banners hang from a low ceiling. Shelves full of dusty, wind-up toys, including tin soldiers and clowns, line the walls. A particular clockwork jester toy on a shelf at eye level, center, its head tilted slightly.

choices.text: Search for a way out through the back of the tent.

scenes.title: Porcelain's Petrifying Purpose
scenes.text: Your fingers brush the doll's porcelain surface. It is unnervingly cold. A sudden jolt, like static electricity, courses through you. Its empty eye sockets seem to bore into your very soul. The whispers coalesce into a single, droning voice within your mind, a language not meant for human ears. Small, jointed wooden figures begin to emerge from the carousel's dusty floorboards, their limbs twitching, their movements jerky and unnatural. They are closing in.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. Your hand, partially visible, reaching towards a porcelain doll with empty eye sockets on a carousel horse, center. Small, wooden jointed doll figures with twitching limbs are emerging from the dusty floorboards around the base of the carousel.

choices.text: Attempt to flee, back towards the carnival entrance.
Shatter the doll, hoping to break the enchantment.

scenes.title: Echoes from the Engine
scenes.text: You crouch low, peering into the gloom beneath the carousel's platform. Rusted gears and broken chains form a skeletal labyrinth. The whispers are louder here, a cacophony of distorted, infant voices that scrape against your sanity. Amidst the grime, a forgotten music box lies, its lid askew. It slowly begins to play a tinny, discordant lullaby. Tiny, metallic dolls with sharp, unnatural edges crawl from the music box, their polished surfaces reflecting the dim light.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. From a crouched position, looking into the dark, rusty underside of a carousel. Rusted gears and broken chains are visible. A small, ornate music box, with its lid askew, is at the center. Tiny, metallic dolls with sharp edges crawl out of the music box.

choices.text: Crush the music box, stopping its dreadful song.
Turn and run, seeking an escape from this horror.

scenes.title: The Jester's Unholy Jig
scenes.text: You step closer to the jester. Its painted smile stretches, impossibly wide. Its small, articulated hands lift, as if poised for a macabre dance. All around you, the other toys on the shelves begin to clatter, their clockwork mechanisms whirring to life. Their glass eyes, once dull, now gleam with malevolent intent, all focused on you. The whispers inside the tent rise to a terrifying crescendo, a chilling chorus that threatens to overwhelm your mind.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A clockwork jester toy on a shelf at eye level, center, its painted smile stretched unnaturally, its articulated hands slightly raised. Many other animated toys with glowing glass eyes are visible on shelves in the background, whirring to life.

choices.text: Try to find a weapon, something to defend yourself.
Run for the tent's main entrance, hoping for escape.

scenes.title: The False Promise of Freedom
scenes.text: You push past hanging drapes, navigating the dimness, hoping for a back exit. A heavy canvas flap appears, secured with rusted clasps. The air grows even colder behind you. The whispers intensify, no longer indistinct, but a chorus of tiny, eager voices. From deeper within the tent, the faint, growing sound of many tiny feet, scuttling on dusty wood, grows louder. The toys are coming for you.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A heavy canvas flap, secured with rusted clasps, at the back of a dimly lit tent. Faded, tattered drapes hang down the sides. In the distance behind the flap, faint animated toy figures are visible approaching from the shadows.

choices.text: Frantically try to unfasten the clasps.
Turn to face the approaching toys, seeking a different path.

scenes.title: A Breath of Bitter Freedom
scenes.text: You burst through the main gates, the cold wind a sudden blessing. The wooden dolls scuttle after you, their movements frenzied, but the light of the outside world, however dim, breaks their dreadful hold. You are free, leaving the carnival's macabre embrace behind, but the whispers echo forever in your mind.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. You are fleeing through the rusted iron gates of the carnival, looking back over your shoulder. Small wooden doll figures are chasing from inside the carnival, their forms indistinct in the distance. A desolate, open field stretches beyond the gate.

scenes.title: Shattered Mind
scenes.text: You bring your hand down, shattering the doll's porcelain head. A piercing shriek, not of sound, but of pure mental anguish, erupts from the broken pieces. The world spins. The carousel begins to whir, faster and faster. You feel your own mind fraying, caught in the machine's maddening throes, the whispers now a permanent, unbearable scream within your skull.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A porcelain doll's head, shattered into many pieces, lies on the dusty floorboards of a rapidly spinning carousel. The carousel's distorted horses blur around you. Your vision is distorted and warped, reflecting mental collapse.

scenes.title: Silence and Reprieve
scenes.text: With grim determination, you crush the music box beneath your heel. A wail, not of pain, but of pure, ethereal fury, erupts from the shattered mechanism. The tiny metallic dolls freeze, then collapse into inert, lifeless piles. The tinny lullaby ceases. A profound silence descends, and the lingering whispers dissipate. The entity is banished, for now. You are safe to leave.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A broken, crushed music box lies amidst dust and grime under the carousel. Tiny, metallic dolls lie inert and lifeless around it. The space beneath the carousel is silent and still, the shadows receding slightly.

scenes.title: A Cold Embrace
scenes.text: You turn to flee, scrambling from beneath the carousel. But the metallic dolls are faster. They swarm you, their sharp edges scraping against your skin. You feel a sudden, splintering cold as their tiny, powerful forms overcome you. Your breath catches. The last thing you perceive is the ceaseless, tinny lullaby fading into profound, endless dark.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. Many tiny, metallic dolls with sharp edges are swarming towards the camera, their forms blurry as they overwhelm the frame. The darkness under the carousel looms, consuming your vision.

scenes.title: The Jester's New Vessel
scenes.text: You desperately grab a rusted pole from the tent floor, swinging it at the jester. The moment of impact brings no shattering, but a searing jolt. A flash of sickly green light erupts from the toy, searing your eyes. You feel a new presence, ancient and cold, settle within you, displacing your own thoughts. Your hands, once yours, now twitch with a different will. The jester grins through your eyes.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A rusted pole, held by your hand, makes contact with the clockwork jester toy on a shelf, causing a bright, sickly green flash of light. The jester's painted face is distorted in a triumphant grin, reflecting in your eyes.

scenes.title: A Silent Exhibit
scenes.text: You turn to run, but the toys are upon you. Their tiny, clockwork hands pull at your clothes, their glass eyes boring into you. A strange numbness spreads through your limbs, then a stiffening. Your vision narrows, the vibrant colors of the tent fading to muted tones. You are no longer moving. You are no longer breathing. You are another part of the carnival's collection, an immobile figure, eyes wide, forever fixed in a silent scream.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. Many animated toys, including tin soldiers and jesters, surround the camera, their tiny hands grasping. Your vision is becoming rigid and doll-like, focusing on a single, painted face of a jester toy directly in front of you.

scenes.title: A Desperate Exit
scenes.text: With frantic effort, your fingers tear at the rusted clasps. They groan, then snap. You push through the canvas flap, stumbling out into the desolate fields beyond the carnival grounds. The cold wind on your face is a baptism. You do not look back, running until the memory of the humming toys and whispering voices is a distant, chilling echo.
scenes.image_prompt: 32-bit painterly pixel horror, retro game aesthetic, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. You are pushing through a torn canvas flap at the back of the carnival tent, looking out at a desolate, moonlit field stretching into the distance. The tent interior, with its menacing toys, is dimly visible behind you.
